DataElement.preferredName: MRI FLAIR Peritumoral Brain Edema Volume Ratio Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The ratio of peritumoral edema volume on FLAIR imaging to enhancing volume post-contrast imaging in a magnetic resonance image.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: MRI FLAIR Peritumoral Brain Edema Volume
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) pulse sequence that uses an inversion recovery technique to null fluids present in the imaging area, improving clarity of the object of interest.:An intracranial edema that develops around a tumor in the meninges or brain._The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) pulse sequence that uses an inversion recovery technique to null fluids present in the imaging area, improving clarity of the object of interest.
